pages.title: Scaly Clam
pages.text: Normal coloration of the mantle ranges from browns and purples to greens and yellows arranged in elongated linear or spot-like patterns.$(br2)Tridacna squamosa grows to 40 centimetres ($(o)16 in$()) across.

pages.title: Scaly Clam
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: None$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
